name: Space Master Forever
description:
Two spaceships got sucked into a black hole and they can't leave. But, they can shoot at each other! You only have the bits that you see, so if a thruster gets shot off, you don't have that thruster anymore and may not be able to move fully.

Controls:

  • Player 1: WSAD (move) 1 (shoot)
  • Player 2: Arrow Keys (move) Enter (shoot)

Based on three of my favourite space games: "Spacewar!" "Splaymaster" and "Captain Forever". I suggest you give those a play at some point.

The AI's a bit basic, but it seems to work OK. I have a tough enough time beating it, so it can't be that bad.  I did want to build some more ships to chose from, but for now there are only two: a fast lightly armed one, and a slow heavily armed one. You can win with either one.

Version of Godot: Latest from github. Released with Hugo's daily builds

Github Link: https://github.com/sdfgeoff/wildjam8
